New Records: Ireland scored their lowest T20I total of 106
Gareth Delany scored 31 runs, his highest in T20I
Barry McCarthy took 3 wickets, his best in T20I
Key Match Events: Ireland recovered from 32-6 to almost win
Pakistan won in the penultimate over
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams were already out of the tournament before the match
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland's performance was a spirited end to the tournament
Pakistan's win was their second in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Lauderhill, Florida
Ireland's total of 106 was their lowest in T20I
Others: The match was Ireland's final game in the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
